events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am not happy with the product.
The reported issue involves a refund request due to the customer dissatisfaction with the purchased jacket.
Assigning the refund request case to the customer service representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so I can proceed with the next steps?
My order number is 123456789. I want to return the jacket because the size is too large and I’m not satisfied with how it fits.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund for your jacket once the item is returned to us. I will send you a prepaid return label via email shortly.
Thank you for the help and quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We’ve received your returned jacket and processed the full refund. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your recent purchase.
We are closing this refund case now. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
